initiative.description: Determines turn order for the entire encounter, from highest to lowest.

turn.apAllocation: Full allotment of Action Points (AP) at the start of your turn.

actions.name: Complex Action
actions.description: Many skills and Talents require more than 1 AP to use.

actions.name: Reaction
actions.description: Some abilities allow you to act outside of your turn.

attackRoll.formula: 1d20 + Attacker's Relevant Sub-Attribute Modifier + Attacker's Weapon Skill Rank + Attacker's Talent/Effect Bonuses + Situational Modifiers

relevantSubAttribute.attribute: Intellect (LOG) Modifier, Insight (INTU) Modifier, or Presence (CHM/WIL) Modifier (spell-specific)

targetedAttacks.effect: x2 damage multiplier (or roll on Critical Hit Table).
Normal damage, but triggers roll on 'Limb Incapacitation Table' on hit.

situationalModifiers.effect: Melee attacks gain Advantage, Ranged attacks gain Disadvantage.
Attacker gains Advantage (if flanking rules are active).

damageCalculation.formula: Base Weapon/Spell Damage + Attacker's Relevant Sub-Attribute Modifier + Attacker's Talent/Effect Bonuses - Defender's Damage Reduction

criticalSuccess.effect: Damage dice are doubled, and modifiers are added once. Triggers a roll on the Critical Hit Table.

damageCalculation.damageReduction: Provided by armor, talents, or resistances.
